title: Python Programming
description: Learn Python from basics to advanced concepts

topics.title: Input/Output
topics.description: Working with input and output operations

problems.title: Basic Input
problems.description: Write a program that takes a name as input and prints a greeting.

problems.title: File Operations
problems.description: Write a program that reads a file and counts the number of lines.
problems.starter_code:
filename = input()
with open(filename) as f:
    print(len(f.readlines()))

problems.title: CSV Reader
problems.description: Write a program that reads a CSV file and outputs the number of rows and columns.
problems.starter_code:
import csv
filename = input()
with open(filename) as f:
    reader = csv.reader(f)
    data = list(reader)
    print(f'Rows: {len(data)}, Columns: {len(data[0]) if data else 0}')

topics.title: Control Flow
topics.description: Learn if-else, loops, and control structures

problems.title: Odd or Even
problems.description: Check if a number is odd or even.
problems.starter_code:
num = int(input())
print('Even' if num % 2 == 0 else 'Odd')

problems.title: FizzBuzz
problems.description: Print numbers from 1 to N with FizzBuzz rules.

hidden_test_cases.expected_output:
1
2
Fizz
4
Buzz
Fizz
7
8
Fizz
Buzz
11
Fizz
13
14
FizzBuzz
hidden_test_cases.output:
1
2
Fizz
4
Buzz
Fizz
7
8
Fizz
Buzz
11
Fizz
13
14
FizzBuzz

problems.title: Prime Numbers
problems.description: Write a program to print all prime numbers up to N.

problems.title: Simple Function
problems.description: Define a function that returns the square of a number.

problems.title: Recursive Factorial
Memoized Fibonacci
List Sum
problems.description: Sum all numbers in a list.

problems.title: Word Frequency
problems.description: Count frequency of each word in a string.
problems.starter_code:
from collections import Counter
text = input().split()
for word, count in Counter(text).items():
    print(f'{word}: {count}')

problems.title: Largest Product
problems.description: Find the largest product of two numbers in a list.
problems.starter_code:
nums = list(map(int, input().split()))
nums.sort()
print(max(nums[0]*nums[1], nums[-1]*nums[-2]))

problems.title: Basic Class
problems.description: Create a class `Person` with attributes `name` and `age`, and a method `introduce`.

visible_test_cases.expected_output: Hello, my name is Alice and I am 30 years old.
visible_test_cases.output: Hello, my name is Alice and I am 30 years old.

hidden_test_cases.expected_output: Hello, my name is Bob and I am 25 years old.
hidden_test_cases.output: Hello, my name is Bob and I am 25 years old.

problems.title: Inheritance
problems.description: Create a class `Student` that inherits from `Person` and adds a method `study`.

visible_test_cases.expected_output:
Hello, my name is Alice and I am 20 years old.
I am studying.
visible_test_cases.output:
Hello, my name is Alice and I am 20 years old.
I am studying.

hidden_test_cases.expected_output:
Hello, my name is Bob and I am 22 years old.
I am studying.
hidden_test_cases.output:
Hello, my name is Bob and I am 22 years old.
I am studying.

problems.title: Polymorphism
problems.description: Create a method `speak` in the `Person` class and override it in the `Student` class.

visible_test_cases.expected_output: Alice says: Hello, I am a student!
visible_test_cases.output: Alice says: Hello, I am a student!

hidden_test_cases.expected_output: Bob says: Hello, I am a student!
hidden_test_cases.output: Bob says: Hello, I am a student!

topics.title: Exception Handling
topics.description: Handle exceptions and create custom error messages

problems.title: Try-Except Block
problems.description: Handle a division by zero error and print 'Cannot divide by zero'.

problems.title: Custom Exception
problems.description: Create a custom exception `NegativeNumberError` and raise it when a negative number is passed.

problems.title: File Not Found Exception
problems.description: Handle a `FileNotFoundError` when trying to read a non-existent file.
